title: Since you can get 2 rune pages for the price of 1...
body: Can we get 1 rune page for the price of half?

replies.body: Do you go into a store and say, I see you have a Buy one get one free, can I just have the free one?
That doesn't even relate to what I said.
nah what i really what is a 7 page bundle to give 14 pages that'll be great
you get 8 pages for cheaper than the 7 bundle while the 2 for 1 sale is on...but some people are stupid. (you obv)
It sort of does as the free one is the half lol
